title: Revised estimates resulting from resolutions and decisions adopted by the Human Rights Council at its fifty-eighth, fifty-ninth and sixtieth regular sessions and thirty-seventh special session
text:
United Nations 
A/C.5/80/L.12
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: Limited 
21 December 2025 
Original: English 
 
25-20997 (E)    241225 
*2520997* 
 
 
Eightieth session 
Fifth Committee 
Agenda item 136 
Proposed programme budget for 2026 
 
 
 
 
 
Belarus, China, Democratic People’s Republic of Korea, Eritrea, Iran 
(Islamic Republic of), Nicaragua, Russian Federation, Sudan and Venezuela 
(Bolivarian Republic of): draft resolution 
 
 
 
 Revised estimates resulting from resolutions and decisions adopted 
by the Human Rights Council at its fifty-eighth, fifty-ninth and 
sixtieth regular sessions and thirty-seventh special session 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Having considered the report of the Secretary-General1 and the related report of 
the Advisory Committee on Administrative and Budgetary Questions, 2 
 
Decides not to approve any resources for the implementation of resolutions 
S-35/1, 51/29, 55/19, 55/21, 55/23, 55/27, 56/17, 57/2, 57/20, 57/36, 58/17, 58/18, 
58/19, 58/21, 58/24, 59/1, 60/3 and 60/21 adopted by the Human Rights Council. 
 
__________________ 
 
1  A/80/525. 
 
2  A/80/7/Add.24.
